name: Sarah Mitchell
achievements: Trained horses to Grand Prix level
Coach of numerous medal final qualifiers
bio:
## Leading with Passion and Experience

Sarah Mitchell brings over 25 years of professional experience to Blackberry Equestrian. Her journey began as a junior rider in the Ontario Hunter Jumper circuit, where she developed the foundation for her training philosophy.

### Training Philosophy

Sarah believes in creating confident, well-rounded horse and rider partnerships. Her approach emphasizes:
- Building strong fundamentals
- Developing trust and communication
- Setting achievable goals
- Creating positive learning experiences

### Competition Success

As both a rider and coach, Sarah has achieved success at all levels of competition. She has trained multiple horses from green to Grand Prix level and coached riders to provincial and national championships.

### Continuing Education

Sarah regularly attends clinics and workshops with international trainers to stay current with training methods and industry best practices. She has trained with Olympic riders and FEI judges to refine her skills.
